customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to keep my keratin treated hair lasting as long as possible, so I bought this to try. You put a dollop through your hair after washing and style with it in...keeps my hair silky soft and shiny. It was expensive but the bottle will last a long time since you don't need to use very much! Love it and will continue to purchase and use all the Coppola Keratin products =)
customer_reviews.author: SEB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this profuct. I have very thin,fine hair & Coppola Keratin has really given my hair a better texture, shine and my hair is really healthy. A couple months ago I had surgery on my elbow and the anesthesia burned my hair. This stuff really saved my hair. I use it every day and it also works great with Aquage products. Like others I received a knock off and I sent it right back. This product works great with all hair types.

customer_reviews.text: I've only used this 3 times. The product is great, but the pump dispenser is defective. It's still full, but I can't get the product to dispense. I'd like an exchange or refund.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Makes my hair look like it's in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Makes my hair look like it's in much better shape than it actually is. Not heavy or greasy. Great for mid-life dull hair!
customer_reviews.author: SkiMamaOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, naturally curly hair. I recently had the Keratin straightening treatment done on my hair so I now use this product everyday. It works great. It makes my hair soft and really helps to prevents frizz. I used it before the Keratin treatment and I liked it then, but now it works even better!
customer_reviews.author: Sylver

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: The stylist who does my Brazilian Blowout recommended and sold this to me. Ordering through Amazon saved me almost half the price paid in the salon. I use on dry hair before using flat iron and find it smoothes my hair without making it look greasy. I also sometimes use it to just tame hair when I don't have time to use a flat iron.
